channel.description: What do you think about 'National Pot Day'? Do you smoke weed? Discuss.

item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:174, topic:440102”][quote author=frozon566 link=topic=542784.msg3982138#msg3982138 date=1335400099]

God, Allah etc most probably isn’t real.

I am a Muslim(half atheist at the same time in a sense) buuut I’m looking at it from a LOGICAL point of view, so many people hang on to religion faaar to much. If religion is false, yous will have wasted your life, if its real thought god, allah etc was s’post to be merciful?
And plus every religion i’ve ever heard of has had the meaning of it changed by people so people need to let go a bit cause there probably saying something someone made up and added in. Believe in what you want but don’t be like RELIGION IS REAL STFU, i hear people saying it enough.

If I disagree’d would you crash a plane into my towers again?

but yeah, that’s my views.

Oh boy. Now it comes down to interpretation of words like Jihad (which translates to “struggle”, in Arabic), in which a small but highly radical group of Muslims have become famous for interpreting the “struggle” as all those who do not follow the same faith. A majority of the Muslim population thinks of it simply as struggle against evil thoughts that will prevent them from becoming a better Muslim. If those are your “views” you’re quite arrogant and way out there in terms of ignorance.

neither parties have the right to use the word “arrogant” in a religious debate.
[/quote]

He’s taking the 3% of a religion and using it to describe the whole because they are the only people who made an impact on his life.[/quote]
oh, I’m sorry, where did I say all muslims are terrorists? Please show me.

Until that day comes, shut the fuck up and stop assuming

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:173, topic:440102”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=542784.msg3982132#msg3982132 date=1335399243]

God, Allah etc most probably isn’t real.

I am a Muslim(half atheist at the same time in a sense) buuut I’m looking at it from a LOGICAL point of view, so many people hang on to religion faaar to much. If religion is false, yous will have wasted your life, if its real thought god, allah etc was s’post to be merciful?
And plus every religion i’ve ever heard of has had the meaning of it changed by people so people need to let go a bit cause there probably saying something someone made up and added in. Believe in what you want but don’t be like RELIGION IS REAL STFU, i hear people saying it enough.

If I disagree’d would you crash a plane into my towers again?

but yeah, that’s my views.

Oh boy. Now it comes down to interpretation of words like Jihad (which translates to “struggle”, in Arabic), in which a small but highly radical group of Muslims have become famous for interpreting the “struggle” as all those who do not follow the same faith. A majority of the Muslim population thinks of it simply as struggle against evil thoughts that will prevent them from becoming a better Muslim. If those are your “views” you’re quite arrogant and way out there in terms of ignorance.
[/quote]

I thought it was already clear Wet Dreamsss is arrogant.[/quote]
It’s very clear.

Read full topic
